title: President visits Aamer Kiani to condole his brotherâ€™s death
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 12 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Friday visited the residence of former health minister Aamer Mehmood Kiani to offer condolence over the death of his brother.
The president offered Fateha and prayed for peace of the departed soul.
He also prayed for strength for bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
